text:
Hey folks, I recently a published an article on my company's site. If you can, give it a read and leave your thoughts. 
Thanks in advance! 

Is Google a monopoly? 

Recently, it came to light that Google is facing a massive $5 billion lawsuit for tracking people in incognito mode. 

But it's not the first time Google has been in hot water—and it won't be the last. 

Google was involved in a huge controversy with its last lawsuit: the Genius lawsuit. 

However, it was more than just a lawsuit. It was an entire case on how Google does their business. 

So I wrote a blog that details everything there is to know about the Genius lawsuit, along with how Genius caught the big G red-handed with a 'genius' method, and other cases where Google has tried to misuse their power. 

The other cases cases include:

- Wikipedia 
- LiveVideo (the original YouTube) 
- CelebrityNetWorth (dot) com 

I've also included two other possible cases. 

After reading the blog, do consider the question again:

Is Google a monopoly?

<https://planetcontent.com/is-google-a-monopoly|https://planetcontent.com/is-google-a-monopoly>

attachments.title: Is Google a Monopoly? Analyzing the Genius Lawsuit [& Other Cases]
attachments.text: With Google's questionable practices coming to light, marketers are finally starting to wonder, is Google a monopoly? Read on for a complete breakdown.
attachments.fallback: Planet Content: Is Google a Monopoly? Analyzing the Genius Lawsuit [& Other Cases]
